Canaccord analyst Paul Morgan raised his price target on Equinix to $525 from $465 following meetings with management. The analyst said he sees near-term upside from the portfolio's top asset, selling into 600 new customer logos, and absorbing capacity from other locations. Morgan sees Equinix as well positioned to deliver double digit secular growth.

Stealing marbles from the new kidat St. Joes. A new 3rd grader showed up at school with a cigar box half filled with beautiful cat eyes. i knew we would end up with them, since we all played for keeps. He lived a block away from school and a block away from me. Those cat eyes kept creeping into my head, so early one saturday morning i went over and stole his cat eyes from under his steps. An hour later, the "Thou shalt not steal" thing came roaring back at my mind, so i took them back.A month later, he moved away and we only won a few of those marbles....

You're still in that 35 Ford 2dr. sedan, with the 56 Buick nailhead engine and out south of town lining up to race to race Tank, in his brown 63 Chev 409, 425 horse beast.
